Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Item
Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knife, Pistol, Shotgun
public abstract class Weapon extends Item implements Serializable
Class used to implement Weapon items, their values, fields, usage
